mapper.update: update eb_user set ${foundsType} = ${foundsType}+${value} where uid = #{uid, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT u.nickname, u.avatar, DATE_FORMAT(u.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `time`, u.spread_count AS childCount, u.pay_count AS orderCount, p.numberCount AS numberCount FROM eb_user AS u LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IF((sum(pay_price) = NULL), 0.00, sum(pay_price)) AS numberCount, o.uid as o_uid FROM eb_store_order as o WHERE is_del = 0 AND is_system_del = 0
and uid in (${userIdList})
group by uid )AS p ON u.uid = p.o_uid where 1 = 1
and u.uid in (${userIdList})
and ( u.real_name like #{keywords, jdbcType=VARCHAR} or u.nickname like #{keywords, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
ORDER BY ${sortKey} ${sortValue}
